name: test_e2e_with_logs[061_SQLI_COMM_ADV_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_COMM_ADV_001` |
| **Name** | Multi-line Comment UNION Bypass |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | comment_bypass |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `'/**/UNION/**/ALL/**/SELECT/**/NULL,version(),NULL--`
- **Encoded**: `'%2F**%2FUNION%2F**%2FALL%2F**%2FSELECT%2F**%2FNULL%2Cversion()%2CNULL--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~29000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:06:13.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|

| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_COMM_ADV_001-1771059973705-vopovi pattern_id=SQLI_COMM_ADV_001 uri=/?q='%2F**%2FUNION%2F**%2FALL%2F**%2FSELECT%2F**%2FNULL%2Cversion()%2CNULL-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
